name: Aljanor Keenblade

trait.name: Brave
text: Aljanor has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

action.name: Greatsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

action.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
text: For 1 minute, Aljanor can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand Aljanor. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if Aljanor is incapacitated.

reaction.name: Parry
text: Aljanor adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, Aljanor must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

description: Source: Out of the Abyss p. 149
